sistema

Class ListaCinema

  • java.lang.Object
    • sistema.ListaCinema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aggregate<Cinema>

    public class ListaCinema
extends java.lang.Object
implements Aggregate<Cinema>
    ListaCinema.java

    A representation of a list of cinema implementing Aggregate. A ListaCinema is is characterized by a static LinkedList of Cinema.

    Author:
    Sara Martino

    • Constructor Detail

      • ListaCinema

        public ListaCinema()

    • Method Detail

      • addNewCinema

        public boolean addNewCinema(Cinema cinema)
        Adds a new cinema to the list and sets the id of this cinema. The id is the index of the cinema in the list.

        Returns false if this cinema already exists.

        Parameters:
        cinema - The new cinema
        Returns:
        true if the new cinema is added, false otherwise

      • removeCinema

        public boolean removeCinema(int cinemaId)
        Removes the cinema specified by the id passed as input from the list.

        Returns null if this cinema does not exist in the list.

        Parameters:
        cinemaId - The id of the cinema to remove
        Returns:
        true if the cinema is removed, false otherwise

      • getIterator

        public ListaCinemaIterator getIterator()
        Returns a ListaCinemaIterator over the list of Cinema.
        Specified by:
        getIterator in interface Aggregate<Cinema>
        Returns:
        the ListaCinemaIterator.
